info.title: Tr√©bol Data Access API
info.description: Resources for API consumers to query their authorized resource and operation accesses on the Data Management API.

200.description: Normal response. Sends an array of API routes available for use.

403.description: Empty response; the request did not meet the security requirements.

500.description: The API is having a general malfunction or is unavailable.

get.description: GET the API resource paths that the current session is authorized to use.

200.description: Normal, empty response, should include CORS headers and only allow the GET method.

options.summary: Preflight check for API resource accesses
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

200.description: Normal response. Sends an AuthorizedAccess object with an array of available and permitted actions.

403.description: Empty response; the request did not meet the security requirements.

500.description: The API is having a general malfunction or is unavailable.

get.description: GET actions that the current session is authorized to do using the products API.

200.description: Normal, empty response, should include CORS headers and only allow the GET method.

options.summary: Preflight check for products API operation accesses

AuthorizedAcess.title: Root Type for AuthorizedAcess
AuthorizedAcess.description: A generic container of API resource paths or actions on a specific resource, for which access is granted

AuthorizedRequest.description: Requests including a Bearer token in their Authorization header.
